cause.description:
this is a support poll for all the musiscians and young ROCKERS out there, we need support and encouragement!! rock out and never give up guys!! dont care wat people think and follow your heart!!
1. Bein a Rocker is a form of of expression
2. Bein a Rocker is part of who you are and about lovin music and balllin out
3. Bein a Rocker there are no holds =] we are our own, fuck the norm
cause.mission: ENcourage all rockers and guitarists and musiscians
cause.name: ROCKERS!!
